summary.span: 提供类型以支持对应用程序创建的内容的版权管理，这些内容存储在 或 中。

span.span: Provides types to support rights management of application-created content such as that stored in a or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何使用和实现权限管理的详细信息，请参阅[Rights Management Services SDK](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/adrms_sdk/active-directory-rights-management-services-sdk-portal)。For more information about how to use and implement rights management, see the [Rights Management Services SDK](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/adrms_sdk/active-directory-rights-management-services-sdk-portal).
